      • gFactors

        private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> gFactors​(Node root,
                                                 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> map)
        Builds objects gFactors list by running a pre order traversal on the grammar.
        Parameters:
        root - current Node
        map - set of NonTerminal evaluations already processed before this node.
        Returns:
        set of NonTerminal evaluations already processed, including this node and its children.

      • getProductions

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getProductions()
        Returns:
